def jsonRes = messageExchange.getResponse().contentAsString
def jsonSlurper = new groovy.json.JsonSlurper(); def parse = jsonSlurper.parseText(jsonRes)
def sailing = parse.prices[0].sailing log.info sailing assert sailing != null
def brand = parse.prices[0].sailing.brandCode log.info brand assert brand == "R"
def shipCode = parse.prices[0].sailing.shipCode log.info shipCode assert shipCode == "NV"
def packageCode = parse.prices[0].sailing.packageCode log.info packageCode assert packageCode == "NV03X023"
def sailDate = parse.prices[0].sailing.sailDate log.info sailDate assert sailDate == "2025-01-03"
